p.seg: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the Year 1921 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the Years 1 9 1 6, 191 7 1 9 1 8, 1919, 1920 and 1921 I. E. HART, W. B. YOUNG, Secretary of Trade and Commerce Chief of Bureau of Inutrana S. R. McKELVIE, Governor

To His Excellency: Hon. Samuel R. McKelvie, Governor. We herewith submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 1921, including the names of companies organized, admitted, reinsured, with- drawn etc., during the year. DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE, J. E .HART, Secretary. W. B. YOUNG, Chief of the Bureau of Insurance.

4 NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT \ ment) Mutual A*> Stock Insur- COMPANIES ORGANIZED, 1921 Commercial Mutual Surety, Lincoln. (Fidelity Bonds) Equity Life, Omaha. (Mutual Legal Reserve) Home and Merchants Fire, Hastings. (Farm Mutual Asse: COMPANIES WITHDRAWN, 1921 Old Colony Life, Chicago, Illinois. American Merchant Marine, New York. Capital Live Stock, Topeka, Kansas. Importers and Exporters, New York. Inter-State Automobile, Rock Rapids, la., License Revoked. Western National Life, Cheyenne, Wyo. COMPANIES LIQUIDATING, 1921 Bankers Automobile, Lincoln, Nebraska. Lion Bonding and Surety Company, Omaha, Nebraska. COMPANIES CHANGED NAME, 1921 Lion Accident and Casualty, Omaha, changed to Pyramid cident. Nebraska Live Stock, Omaha, changed to Nebraska Live ance and Indemnity Company.
